comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: in the lower left is a note that would indicate it is the Lexington Ave tube.  This would be the end of the Lex line and on the north side begin  IRT Jerome Avenue Line (heading north) and the IRT Pelham Line (heading east)

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: A 1915 Engineering thesis describes the constuction and sinking of the Harlem River Tubes. : www.nycsubway.org/articles/harlem_river_tubes.html
